abstract: The energy company BP cut the 2006 bonus of John Browne, its departing chief executive, almost in half for a year when the company reported record earnings but faced accusations that cost-cutting led to safety lapses at a plant in Texas.

headline.main: BP Cuts Bonus in Half for Outgoing Executive
